title: Critical view on antimicrobial, antibiofilm and cytotoxic activities of quinazolin-4(3H)-one derived schiff bases and their Cu(II) complexes
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Dominika Pindjakova, Sarka Mascaretti, Jana Hricoviniova, Jan Hosek, Jana Gregorova, Jiri Kos, Alois Cizek, Zuzana Hricoviniova, Josef Jampilek
